Description: Returns the character at the specified index.
Concatenates the specified string to the end of this string.
Checks if the string contains a specified sequence of characters.
Example Usage: String str = "Hello World"; boolean contains = str.contains("World");

Description: Compares this string to a specified CharSequence.
Tests if the string ends with the specified suffix.
Example Usage: String str = "Hello World"; boolean endsWith = str.endsWith("World");

Description: Compares this string to the specified object.
Example Usage: String str1 = "Hello"; String str2 = "Hello"; boolean equals = str1.equals(str2);

Description: Compares two strings
Return Type: String str1 = "Hello"; String str2 = "hello"; boolean equals = str1.equalsIgnoreCase(str2);

Description: Encodes this string into a sequence of bytes.
Returns a hash code for the string.
Returns the index of the first occurrence of a specified character or substring.
Example Usage: String str = "Hello World"; int index = str.indexOf("World");

Description: Checks if the string is empty.
Returns the index of the last occurrence of a specified character or substring.
Example Usage: String str = "Hello World World"; int lastIndex = str.lastIndexOf("World");

Description: Returns the length of the string.
Replaces all occurrences of a specified character or substring with another.
Replaces each substring that matches a regex with a replacement string.
Replaces the first substring that matches a regex with a replacement string.
Splits this string around matches of the given regex.
Example Usage: String str = "Hello World"; String[] parts = str.split(" ");

Description: Tests if the string starts with the specified prefix.
Example Usage: String str = "Hello World"; boolean startsWith = str.startsWith("Hello");

Description: Returns a substring starting from the specified beginIndex to endIndex.
Example Usage: String str = "Hello World"; String subStr = str.substring(0

Description: Converts this string into a new character array.
Converts all characters of this string to lowercase.
Converts all characters of this string to uppercase.
Removes leading and trailing whitespace from the string.
Example Usage: String str = "  Hello World  "; str = str.trim();

Description: Returns the string representation of the specified value.
